DarkMouse::

She stopped near a small lake and sat on an old tree stump. She 
couldn't figure out how hit maximal was following her so well. She 
had done everything she could think of to loose him. Or her. She 
zigged and zagged around. She even went so far as to go over a 
waterfall just so she could move and not leave tracks.  She swam a 
few miles before reaching the banks. Water doesn't carry scent. 
"How is this one so darn good?" she muttered to herself. 

She opened her commlink,"Hey,Galvatron. Uh, I can't seem to get rid 
of this one. Mind lendning me a paw? I'm roughly 30 miles from your 
ship. I could use some help. This maximal is good who ever he is. 
He's close to me. SO if you shoot, shoot to hit his signature, not 
mine."

Despite the fact that anyone could really be listening in, she just 
wanted to see this bot and find out why he/she had been following 
her. Little did she know, she was asking for more trouble than she 
would care to get into.
